sections.heading: Annual renewal; expiration on failure to renew6-980
sections.text: Annual renewal; expiration on failure to renewA. For licenses approved on or before March 31, 2009:1. Licenses that are not renewed by March 31, 2009 are suspended, and the licensee shall not act as a commercial mortgage banker until the license is
